reviewText: This ball needed air straightout the box. My boys were unable to play with it and now I need to purchase an air pump. Will not purchase again should have brought from a local store.
good for kids is durable and not damaged so fast with water. I worked to improve her shooting and practice my dribbling
This is a great basketball. My son has had it for over a year and it is still going strong

My daughter said the grip wasn't the best, and it didn't bounce as well as other balls she has had in the past. She is only ten years old but she loves basketball and the ball was for her so I thought you should hear her point of view. The ball has been serviceable and is very good for the price. I must also say that it has taken a beating with all my children and the neighbors children as well giving it a torture treatment every day , yet it still bounces and it still is in one piece.

Bought this last Christmas, it made it through the summer, but by this point it no longer has any grip. So I got the kids another one this Christmas. At this price ($8.99) I believe we got our value out of it but feel it should have stood up to a little more abuse than it did.
This ball is the size used by grade school teams. It is an outdoor ball so it may be a little heavier. Make sure you have an air pump and air gauge to get the pressure and size right.
